QuestData.Title: Grim(oire) Business
QuestData.Description: There is one more gronn to be slain: Skulloc Soulgrinder. He keeps himself hidden away, but there is a way to coax him forth.$B$BHe was trained by an ogre warlock known as Vim'gol the Vile, whose grimoire you must retrieve!$B$BVim'gol must be summoned by standing within a fire ring at his circle. Find Vim'gol's Circle in the mountains, to the northeast, near the Broken Wilds.
QuestData.CompletionText: Have you summoned forth Vim'gol the Vile and taken the grimoire from his dead clutches?
QuestData.RewardText: I hesitate to even touch such a tainted thing of evil. Yet read it we must if we are to glean what knowledge it contains and bring forth Skulloc from his hiding place.
